Work and Experience

Currently I am a Senior Machine Learning ENgineer at Analog Devices, Below mentioned are some of my undergrad Internships.

Bigdata and cloud computing Intern

I interned at I-MEDITA. During my internship i learnt and implemented Big-data Hadoop Technology on Weather Data Analysis using Map-Reduce, pig. During my time, I successfully did the following project.

  1. Auto Mail Generator for SQL Queries -This project consisted of analysis of weather forecast details over a span of 10 years, with the help of Hadoop Technology using Map-reduce, Pig and hive

The project details can be found here

Data Analyst Intern- CareerIn

I was interning at Careerin,where During this role i Collected and Analysed informations of various Educational Institutions Belonging to the north Eastern states of India and hence retrieved the area specific dependability of education quality for various indian states.

  1. School Data Authentication and Analysis - In this role i gathered info about many indian schools around north-eastern India .

As of now the project details are confidential

IGV Team Leader- CRM

I worked at AIESEC. It's the world's Largest Youth Run Organization. During my time, I successfully did the following work.

  1. Incomming Global Volunteers CRM - Here i Interacted and maintained good relations with the head of many Educational Organizations and NGO's while getting many Local and National Level Projects for the company.
  2. EXPA Administrator - EXPA is the Online Match-Making server of AIESEC that matches the needs of various interns to the correct projects, i handled the proper working of it, while ensuring enough matches for my Local Community.
